event.title: is derived from Seaside House, a historic summer

data.event: The name Seaside is derived from Seaside House, a historic summer resort built in the 1870s by railroad magnate Ben Holladay.

event.title: January 1, 1806, a group of men from the Lewis and Clark Expedition built

data.event: About January 1, 1806, a group of men from the Lewis and Clark Expedition built a salt-making cairn at the present site of Seaside.
The city was incorporated on February 17, 1899.
After living in San Francisco, California and Astoria, Oregon, Gilbert moved to Seaside where he had a beach cottage (built in 1885).
In 1892 he added to his beach cottage.
